description: HI VIS POLYESTER PU COATED POLYESTER RAINWEARHIGH VIS/RAINWEAR All high vis garments are certified in accordance with EN 471. 24 hour visibility - EN 471 Extreme weather protection - EN 343Our promise At Helly Hansen Workwear, we have one job: to design clothes that keep professionals dry, Warm and safe work. Our founder, Captain Helly Juell Hansen, began tackling this challenge back in 1877, when he invented waterproof clothing for seafarers and fishermen. Now it's up to us to continue rising to the challenge day after day. Over 130 years of dedication to innovation and quality have made Helly Hansen Workwear one of the world's biggest and best workwear companies. Today we are a leading manufacturer of workwear for the new generation of tradespeople. Style and quality go hand in hand. We combine fashion and design experience with knowledge of the raw forces of nature that our workwear has to withstand. The result: workwear that looks good while protecting people who work in the most extreme conditions on land and at sea. Dressed in Helly Hansen Workwear, you will feel the benefit of our 130 years of experience. Designed with emphasis on innovation, safety and comfort, our workwear makes day-to-day work easier, safer and more enjoyable. We combine advanced textiles with functional design, and test our products under the most extreme conditions with one goal in mind: To live up to our promise to keep you dry, Warm and safe work.
